I condemn the horrific acts of terror in #Istanbul. My thoughts are with those who lost their loved ones and our Ally Turkey.
Terror has become one of the most ugly faces of all that violate all values ​​and morals, we witnessed once more in Istanbul tonight.
There is no such thing as the name and method of the terrorist organization that has made this low attack that we have experienced many times in recent years.
With the PKK, DEAŞ, and all of the terrorist organizations of FETO, they are attacking my country and nationality for the same purpose.
With God's help, there is no doubt that we will come from the tops of terrorist organizations and the forces behind them.
No weapon was invented that could turn a nation's path that struggled with the notion of "I die, martyr, stakeout veteran".
We will continue our struggle without hesitating knowing that for a thousand years we will be adding new territories to our blood to make these lands home.
10 December I wish our brothers and sisters who have died in terrorist attacks in Istanbul to have mercy from Allah and our injured people to have urgent healing.
